item.title: Ghost's do they exist? u dare to watch these vids? [rep of MJ.]
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“reverce, post:10, topic:287482”][quote author=`Lewk_ link=topic=380130.msg2858203#msg2858203 date=1247009019]

That’s fucking retarded.

  1. Ghosts don’t exist
  2. If ghosts did exist, They wouldn’t be walking around.
  3. ^, They wouldn’t have shadows.

[/quote]

they dont exist? lol … go google lol[/quote]
No.

Read full topic

item.title: Ghost's do they exist? u dare to watch these vids? [rep of MJ.]
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:11, topic:287482”]What the Hell?
The first one at the top is just someone making a scary noise and then wth is she doing?

The second one is just a chair rocking that can be done with a string and rocking chair.

The third is a lie they said they left a camera there and yet the Camera moves. And it also can be done with String

And I personally cant hear it.br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2009, 05:41:25 am[/size][/quote]

haha XD

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

First video: Description says it’s fake.
Second video: Retarded screamer + the chair was probably moved with a piece of string.
Third video: A door opening + editing.
Fourth video: I’m not fucking wasting 8 minutes of my life watching that.
